meanings.sent1: The perspectival drawing made the building look taller than it actually was.
meanings.sent2: Her perspectival view of the situation helped her understand it better.
meanings.sent3: The perspectival painting made the artist seem like a giant standing next to the house.
meanings.sent4: From a perspectival angle, the mountain appeared to touch the sky.
meanings.sent5: The perspectival lens distorted the image, making everything seem farther away.
